tr.tr:
Welcome to the StickBot!

This bot can create beautiful stickers from your messages. You can send text to me or add me to the group chat. I will create sticker from forwarded messages.

Let`s go!

Small user manual!

How to create the sticker? There are some ways to do that.

Using this chat : 
1. Forward message with the quote here and I will create the sticker
2. Use "🦄 Create" button
3. Send a command as a reply to the message with needed text (read more later)

In group chat
1. Send a command as a reply to the message with needed text (read more later)

Supported commands :/q - creates random sticker
/qg - creates green sticker
/qw - creates white sticker
/qb - creates blue sticker
/qv - creates violet sticker
